title: Kairegai Polathan Kadhal Song Lyrics Ninaithadhu Yaaro
stanzas:
Kairegai Pola Thaan Kadhal Song Lyrics Ninaithadhu Yaaro
#Chinmayi

Kairegai polathaan kadhal
endrum azhiyaadhe endrum
nam nenjil

kann imai polathaan kadhal
endrum vilagaadhe
anbe nam kannil.

mezhugaagave nenjam nenjam
medhuvaagave urugum konjam
sila sollaadha sogangal
sugamaagum, idhamaagum

yedho baaram
idhayam sumandhaal
un nenjil saindhu
azhave ninaithaen

Kairegai polathaan kadhal
endrum azhiyaadhe endrum
nam nenjil

unnai ezhudhum kavidhai
adhile kadaisi varthai
naanaai iruppen

unnai suttri kanavaai
varuven
nee vendaam endraal
kalaidhe viduven
